label: SubordinateLocation
comment: A physical location or place which is a subordinate location of a location.

datatypeProperties.comment: The unique identifier for this subordinate location, such as a United Nations Location Code (UNLOCODE) or GS1 Global Location Number (GLN).
The code specifying the type of subordinate location.
The name, expressed as text, of this subordinate location.

objectProperties.comment: Physical geographical coordinate information for this subordinate location.
The location subordinate to this subordinate location.

referencedBy.comment: A location subordinate to this logistics related location.
